DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness Light Weight Breast Implant ( LWBI ) breast augmentation .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Safety & Efficacy Light Weight Breast Implant
DOC.detailed_description: This Single-center . The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness LWBI breast augmentation .
DOC.criteria: Genetic woman age 18 65 seek breast enlargement Signed informed consent Agreement complete require follow visit A medically acceptable candidate Sufficient breast tissue proper implant coverage ( â‰¥20 mm pinch test ) Patients active infection anywhere body Women currently pregnant nursing Insufficient tissue cover prospective area implantation ( e.g . precede breast reduction ) , radiation damage reduce vascularization Abscesses , malignant tumor ( cancer recurrent metastasis ) , advance fibrocystic disease Patients history psychiatric treatment Patients implant silicone implant ( e.g . silicone artificial joint , facial implant ) Expected allergy extraordinary immune response implant Wound heal impairment heavy burn scar Existing costal injury The Patient Participated investigational trial within 30 day enrollment
